price: 42. Et ce n’est pas, non plus, le propos d’un devin. Comme vous êtes peu nombreux à y réfléchir !
arabic: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walā biqawli kāhinin qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
